circumstances: While in cruising altitude, the crew informed ATC about a double engine failure and was cleared to divert to the nearest airport for an emergency landing. Unable to maintain a safe altitude, the pilot-in-command attempted to land in a field when the airplane struck trees and crashed. Four passengers and a pilot were killed while three other occupants were injured.
probable_cause: Double engine failure in flight for undetermined reason. Powerplant/engines would not airstart for unknown reason.
